QuestData.Title: A Grim Trophy
QuestData.Description: It would seem Sylvanas does not wish to be followed - by us or anyone else.$B$BHer will is her own, it is not my place to question. Only to obey.$B$BIn the hills nearby, a gryphon master is preparing to take flight, no doubt to pursue our queen from the sky. My rangers are lying in wait - we need only to close our jaws around him.$B$BI will have his head when this is over.
QuestData.LogDescription: Take the Head of Thane Wildsky.
